author: eptwts
text:
money is ultimately wasted if it's only used to change YOUR life...

there's so much good you can do by gaming the system that's rigged against us & not being stingy with your newfound wealth

don't fall for the flashy lifestyle psyop, it's a never-ending spiral of degeneracy

help your family, make sure they're good - then help the unfortunate ones in your local community

if every community had a bunch of people like this there'd be a lot less struggle in this world
